caption: This is a country pop music piece. There is a female vocalist singing melodically as the lead. The melody comprises various elements such as the electric guitar, the bass guitar, the harmonica and the banjo. There is a rock acoustic drum beat in the rhythmic background. The atmosphere is easygoing. This piece could be the opening theme of a teenage sit-com.
